tool_description: Analyzes target audience demographics and psychographics to identify content interests, preferences, and engagement patterns.

platform.description: Primary platform for audience analysis (instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube)

error_messages: Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube].
Invalid gender specification: Use one of [male, female, all].
Insufficient audience data: Not enough data available for specified demographic combination.
usage: Specify age_range and platform, optionally add gender, interests array, and geographic_location. Returns audience behavior patterns and content preferences.

top_interests.description: Most popular interest categories for this demographic

peak_activity_hours.description: Hours when audience is most active

engagement_triggers.description: Content elements that drive highest engagement
